com.attivio.sdk.client.dictionary

Interface EntityDictionaryApi


  • public interface EntityDictionaryApi
    API for managing entity dictionaries.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getDictionary

        D getDictionary(String dictionaryName)
         throws AttivioException
        Get the metadata for a dictionary identified by dictionaryName.

        Returns null if this dictionary does not exist.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • getDictionaries

        Iterable<D> getDictionaries(String query,
                            int offset,
                            int rows)
                     throws AttivioException
        Get all dictionaries.

        Dictionaries will be returned sorted according to name.

        If query is specified, this value will be used to match dictionaries by performing a prefix match against the dictionary's name.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • createDictionary

        void createDictionary(D info)
               throws AttivioException
        Create a dictionary.

        If a dictionary with the same name already exists, an exception will be thrown.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • updateDictionary

        void updateDictionary(D info)
               throws AttivioException
        Update metadata for a dictionary.

        If a dictionary with this name does not already exist, an exception will be thrown.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • deleteDictionary

        void deleteDictionary(String dictionaryName)
               throws AttivioException
        Delete the dictionary identified by dictionaryName.
        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • copyDictionary

        void copyDictionary(String dictionaryName,
                    String newName)
             throws AttivioException
        Create a copy of the dictionary identified by dictionaryName with the name newName.

        Will fail if dictionary with name of newName already exists.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • compileDictionary

        void compileDictionary(String dictionaryName)
                throws AttivioException
        Compile a dictionary identified by dictionaryName.

        This method will compile all metadata for the dictionary into binary form.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • publishDictionary

        void publishDictionary(String dictionaryName)
                throws AttivioException
        Publish a dictionary identified by dictionaryName.

        Upon successful return from this method, the binary dictionary previously compiled via compileDictionary(String) will be made visible to all transformers/components.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • createTerm

        void createTerm(String dictionaryName,
                E term)
         throws AttivioException
        Create a new dictionary term for the dictionary specified by name.

        If a dictionary entry already exists for the dictionary for the same term, an exception will be thrown.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • updateTerm

        void updateTerm(String dictionaryName,
                E term)
         throws AttivioException
        Update the metadata for a term for dictionaryName.

        NOTE: This method does not support modifying the TermDefinition.getTerm() or TermDefiniton#getLocale() as these values define the unique key for the term. In order to change these properties, you must first call #createTerm(String, E) with the new value, and then upon success, call #deleteTerm(String, E) to delete the previous value.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • updateTerms

        void updateTerms(String dictionaryName,
                 Iterable<E> terms)
          throws AttivioException
        Update the metadata for all terms for dictionaryName.

        If any term does not yet exist, it will be created, as if by #createTerm(String, E).

        If the term already exists, it will be updated, as if by #updateTerm(String, E).

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • deleteTerm

        void deleteTerm(String dictionaryName,
                E term)
         throws AttivioException
        Delete the term in dictionaryName identified by TermDefinition.getTerm(), TermDefinition.getLocale().
        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • deleteTerms

        void deleteTerms(String dictionaryName,
                 Locale locale,
                 String prefix)
          throws AttivioException
        Delete terms for dictionaryName.

        If locale is specified, will only delete terms matching this locale.

        If prefix is specified, will only delete terms that match this prefix.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • getLocales

        Map<Locale,Long> getLocales(String name,
                            String query)
                     throws AttivioException
        Get a map of locales for dictionary specified by name.

        The value for the map will contain the number of entries in the dictionary specified for the locale.

        If the query is specified, this will be used to filter the matching dictionary entries.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • getTerms

        Iterable<E> getTerms(String dictionaryName,
                     Locale locale,
                     String prefix,
                     int offset,
                     int rows)
              throws AttivioException
        Get all terms for a dictionary identified by dictionaryName.

        Terms will be returned sorted according to term.

        If locale is specified, results will be filtered to only include terms for the specified locale.

        If prefix is specified, results will be filtered to only include terms matching this prefix.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • getMatches

        Iterable<M> getMatches(String dictionaryName,
                       Locale locale,
                       String term,
                       int offset,
                       int rows)
                throws AttivioException
        Get all matches from dictionaryName for term according to locale.

        Matching will be performed against the most recently compiled dictionary.

        Any exact matches will be returned first.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • exportDictionary

        void exportDictionary(String dictionaryName,
                      OutputStream output)
               throws AttivioException
        Export a dictionary identified by dictionaryName to output.

        XML format will be used for dictionary export.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • importDictionary

        void importDictionary(InputStream input,
                      String name)
               throws AttivioException
        Import a dictionary, optionally giving it a new name.

        Requires input to be formatted in XML according to exportDictionary(String, OutputStream).

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • exportBinary

        void exportBinary(String dictionaryName,
                  boolean published)
           throws AttivioException
        Export a text representation of the compiled dictionary identified by dictionaryName.

        If published is true, the published view will be exported. Otherwise, the most recentely compiled dictionary view will be exported.

        NOTE: This export is for debugging purposes only. It cannot be re-imported. This output will reflect all processing that occurs during dictionary compilation.

        Throws:
        AttivioException

      • upgradeDictionary

        @Deprecated
void upgradeDictionary(InputStream input)
                            throws AttivioException
        Deprecated. Support will be removed for upgrading dictionaries in a future release.
        Import a dictionary from a 4.x export.
        Throws:
        AttivioException
